verse: People should think of us as servants of Christ, ·the ones God has trusted with his [and stewards/household managers of God’s] ·secrets [mysteries].

·You think you already have everything you need [Already you have been satisfied/filled up!; the Corinthians believed they had reached a higher spiritual status because of their wisdom]. ·You think you are rich [Already you are rich!]. Even ·to this very hour [or now] we do not have enough to eat or drink or to wear. We are often beaten, and we have no homes in which to live.
